root.TaylorSwift:

CSI Miami CSI: Crime Scene Investigation Raising Hope CSI New York Blue Bloods Law & Order SVU New Girl Til’ Death CSI: Crime Scene Investigation New Girl </1> <2> What movies did Taylor Swift appear in? Valentine’s Day The Lorax Sharknado The Getaway Letter’s to Juliet The Giver Beverly Hills Chihuahua 3 New Year’s Eve Valentine’s Day The Giver </2> <3> What movies did Taylor Swift contribute to their soundtrack? New Year’s Eve Hannah Montana: Best of Both Worlds The Hunger Games The Giver Divergent Valentine’s Day The Lorax The Hunger Games Catching Fire Valentine’s Day The Hunger Games </3> <4> What Award Shows did Taylor Swift win a collaboration award at? Billboard Awards Country Music Association Awards CMT Music Awards American Country Awards Golden Globes Academy of Country Music Awards Grammy Awards People’s Choice Awards American Country Awards Country Music Association Awards </4> <5> What awards did Taylor Swift win best artist? American Music Awards Academy of Country Music Awards Grammys People’s Choice Billboard Music Awards Country Music Awards Teen Choice Awards Brit Awards Teen Choice Awards Academy of Country Music Awards </5> <6> Which songs from the Speak Now Album went at least 3x platinum, by RIAA Standards? Mine The Story of Us Back to December Mean Sparks Fly Better Than Revenge Ours Dear John Mine Mean </6> <7> Who are the hosts of SNL when Taylor Swift was the performer? Rosario Dawson Gerald Butler Neil Patrick Harris Hugh Laurie January Jones Taylor Swift Tim McGraw Joseph Gordon-Levitt Taylor Swift Neil Patrick Harris </7>

root.CarrieUnderwood:
<1> What singles were released on the Carnival Ride album? Get Out of This Town So Small Twisted Just a Dream Wheel of the World Crazy Dreams I Know You Won’t The More Boys I Meet So Small Just a Dream </1>
<2> Which Carrie Underwood Christmas related songs were duets? The First Noel What Child is This Do You Hear What I Hear All is Well Here Comes Santa Claus Hark! The Herald Angel Sings O Holy Night I’ll Be Home for Christmas All is Well I’ll Be Home for Christmas </2>
<3> What were the Opening Acts for Carrie Underwood’s Carnival Ride Tour? Josh Turner Sons of Sylvia Jason Michael Carroll Damien Leith Craig Morgan Hunter Hayes Billy Currington Kira Isabella Josh Turner Jason Michael Carroll </3>
<4> What Carrie Underwood music videos were directed by Deaton-Flanigen? Undo It I Told You So Cowboy Casanova Temporary Home Good Girl Mama’s Song Blown Away Remind Me Temporary Home Remind Me </4> <5> What awards shows does Carrie Underwood have a winning percentage greater than 50%, with at least 15 nominations? American Music Awards Grammy Awards Academy of Country Music Awards People’s Choice Awards CMT Music Awards Teen Choice Awards American Country Awards Billboard Music Awards CMT Music Awards Billboard Music Awards </5> <6> Which NBA Teams has Carrie Underwood performed for? Miami Heat Dallas Mavericks Toronto Raptors Detroit Pistons San Antonio Spurs Houston Rockets New York Knicks Los Angeles Lakers Detroit Pistons San Antonio Spurs </6>
<7> (Medium) Which two teams did Carrie Underwood Perform for in the 2007 World Series? Saint Louis Cardinals Chicago White Sox Detroit Tigers Philadelphia Phillies San Francisco Giants Boston Red Sox Colorado Rockies New York Yankees Boston Red Sox Colorado Rockies </7>
